itemList.itemDescription: A formidable processor. A system of exceptional cameras. A fast-charging battery. The newest entry in the Galaxy S lineup is here—delivering iconic features of the Galaxy S10 at a shockingly accessible value. Get the Galaxy S10 Lite starting at $399.99 with eligible trade-in.
